verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> because <S%H3282>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> hath <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> she is <S%H7665>broken<s%> that was the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> she is <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me: I shall be <S%H4390>replenished,<s%> now she is laid waste: <S%H2717><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, O <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and will cause <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, as the <S%H3220>sea<s%> causeth his <S%H1530>waves<s%> to come <S%H5927>up.<s%>

And they shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and break <S%H2040>down<s%> her <S%H4026>towers:<s%> I will also <S%H5500>scrape<s%> her <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> her, and <S%H5414>make<s%> her like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

It shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a place for the <S%H4894>spreading<s%> of <S%H2764>nets<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H957>spoil<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be <S%H2026>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> from the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> with <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and with <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and with <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H6951>companies,<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

He shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, and lift <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H6793>buckler<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee.
And he shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H4239>engines<s%> of <S%H6904>war<s%> against thy <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and with his <S%H2719>axes<s%> he shall break <S%H5422>down<s%> thy <S%H4026>towers.<s%>

By reason of the <S%H4480>abundance<s%> <S%H8229><s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> their <S%H80>dust<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee: thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H4480>noise<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and of the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> and of the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> when he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> as men enter <S%H3996>into<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> wherein is made a <S%H1234>breach.<s%>

With the <S%H6541>hooves<s%> of his <S%H5483>horses<s%> shall he tread <S%H7429>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H2351>streets:<s%> he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and thy <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4676>garrisons<s%> shall go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And they shall make a <S%H7997>spoil<s%> of thy <S%H2428>riches,<s%> and make a <S%H962>prey<s%> of thy <S%H7404>merchandise:<s%> and they shall break <S%H2040>down<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls,<s%> and <S%H5422>destroy<s%> thy <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> thy <S%H68>stones<s%> and thy <S%H6086>timber<s%> and thy <S%H6083>dust<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And I will cause the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of thy <S%H7892>songs<s%> to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of thy <S%H3658>harps<s%> shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee like the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock:<s%> thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a place to spread nets <S%H4894>upon;<s%> <S%H2764><s%> thou shalt be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> to <S%H6865>Tyrus;<s%> Shall <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H4480>sound<s%> <S%H6963><s%> of thy <S%H4658>fall,<s%> when the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> <S%H602>cry,<s%> when the <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> is <S%H2026>made<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee?

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H3678>thrones,<s%> and lay <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4598>robes,<s%> and put <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>garments:<s%> they shall <S%H3847>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H2731>trembling;<s%> they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> at every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> and be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> thee.

And they shall take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thee, and <S%H559>say<s%> to thee, <S%H349>How<s%> art thou <S%H6>destroyed,<s%> that wast <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> of seafaring <S%H4480>men,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> the <S%H1984>renowned<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>wast<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> and her <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> to be on <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>haunt<s%> it!

Now <S%H6258><s%> shall the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H2729>tremble<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H4658>fall;<s%> yea, the <S%H339>isles<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled<s%> at thy <S%H4480>departure.<s%> <S%H3318><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> When I shall <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H2717>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> like the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> when I shall bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee;

When I shall bring thee <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of old <S%H5769>time,<s%> and shall <S%H3427>set<s%> thee in the low <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> in places <S%H2723>desolate<s%> of <S%H4480>old,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6643>glory<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living;<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H1091>terror,<s%> and thou shalt be <S%H369>no<s%> more: though thou be sought <S%H1245>for,<s%> yet shalt thou <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
